name: I think I'm... Lost
description:
! This is submission for the Newbies Game Jam 2022-1 !
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ STORY ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
"I think I'm... Lost " is game that features a small demon who has to complete levels by pressing buttons, evading enemies and carefully jumping on platforms.
The objective of the game is to escape this mysterious and dangerous mist and get to the end.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ CONTROLS ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
WASD - Movement
SPACE - Jump
R - Reset
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ NOTE ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
I wanted to add collectibles, and that's why you will find blank places, but I didn't have enough time as I got very sick.
Also there are 2 common bugs: One of the enemy is invisible and sometimes you get reset on a different level, I'm sorry.
